headline: Workday Set to Report Q1 Results: Will Revenue Growth Boost Earnings?
summary: WDAY's first-quarter top line is likely to have gained from healthy demand across multiple end markets, product innovation and AI focus.

headline: Judge allows Workday AI bias lawsuit to proceed as collective action
summary: “Allegedly widespread discrimination is not a basis for denying notice,” the judge ruled — even if the class involves “hundreds of millions” of members.

raw.headline: Judge allows Workday AI bias lawsuit to proceed as collective action

headline: Stay Ahead of the Game With Workday (WDAY) Q1 Earnings: Wall Street's Insights on Key Metrics

headline: Workday Unveils Next Generation of Illuminate Agents to Transform HR and Finance Operations
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, today announced a new wave of Illuminate Agents designed to significantly speed up the hiring processes, improve frontline worker experiences, streamline complex financial processes, and empower employees to find information quickly and easily.
